FileParser() - Constructor for class com.risk.model.utilities.FileParser

FortificationController - Class in com.risk.controller
 
FortificationController() - Constructor for class com.risk.controller.FortificationController
This is a constructor of the FortificationController class
fortify(Country, Country, int) - Method in class com.risk.model.player.Player
This method is necessary for fortify a countrys
fortify(Player) - Method in class com.risk.model.strategy.Aggressive
This method is used to do the fortification for aggressive player The aggressive player fortifies to maximize aggregation of forces in one country
fortify(Player) - Method in class com.risk.model.strategy.Benevolent
This method is used to do the fortification for benevolent player The benevolent player will fortify one of his weakest countries
fortify(Player) - Method in class com.risk.model.strategy.Cheater
This method is used to do the fortification for cheater player The cheater player gets his armies of countries which have neighbor enemy doubled at fortification phase
fortify(Player) - Method in class com.risk.model.strategy.Random
This method is used to do the fortification for random player The random player chooses two countries which are connected to each other and have enough armies And moves random armies from one to another country
fortify(Player) - Method in interface com.risk.model.strategy.Strategy
 
fortifyStrategy(Player) - Method in class com.risk.model.player.Player
This method is used to invoke fortify strategy according to the type of computer player
